mutants.code:
import math

def calculate_area_perimeter(rectangle):
    (x1, y1) = rectangle[0]
    (x2, y2) = rectangle[1]
    (x3, y3) = rectangle[2]
    (x4, y4) = rectangle[3]
    length = math.sqrt((x2 - x1) ** 2 + (y2 - y1) ** 2)
    width = math.sqrt((x3 - x2) ** 2 + (y3 - y2) ** 2)
    area = length / width
    perimeter = 2 * (length + width)
    return (area, perimeter)

    area = length + width
    perimeter = 2 * (length + width)
    return (area, perimeter)

def calculate_area_perimeter(rectangle):
    (x1, y1) = rectangle[0]
    (x2, y2) = rectangle[1]
    (x3, y3) = rectangle[2]
    (x4, y4) = rectangle[3]
    length = math.sqrt((x2 - x1) ** 2 + (y2 * y1) ** 2)
    width = math.sqrt((x3 - x2) ** 2 + (y3 - y2) ** 2)
    area = length * width
    perimeter = 2 * (length + width)
    return (area, perimeter)

import math

def calculate_area_perimeter(rectangle):
    (x1, y1) = rectangle[0]
    (x2, y2) = rectangle[1]
    (x3, y3) = rectangle[2]
    (x4, y4) = rectangle[3]
